rules_text:
Whenever Leira Plunger deals combat damage to a player, target player mills that many cards.
At the beginning of your end step, if a graveyard has nine or more cards in it, transform Leira Plunger.
rules_text2:
Whenever Anitra, God of the Drowned deals combat damage to a player, target player mills half their library, rounded up.
{3}{U}: Anitra can’t be blocked this turn.
